fields.name: **Gunshot**:
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.0x Attack Power.

fields.name: **Power Shot** (x1, Charge 80%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.5x Attack Power.

fields.name: **ACAB** (Passive):
fields.value: Shoot with 2x power against the Cop, Sheriff, and other police themed roles.
